gw.cc.financials.check.entity

Interface CheckPortion


  • public interface CheckPortion
    CheckPortion Indicates the amount that applies to a check.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Currency getCheckCurrency()
      Gets this check portion's check's currency.
      Currency getClaimCurrency()
      Gets this check portion's claim's currency.
      java.math.BigDecimal getFixedAmount()
      defers to #getFixedTransactionAmount; in multicurrency mode, that method should be preferred
      java.lang.String getMultiCurrencyDisplayName(Check check)
      Returns DisplayName if Percentage or Check is null.
      Currency getReservingCurrency()
      Gets this check portion's check's reserving currency.
      void setFixedAmount(java.math.BigDecimal value)
      defers to setFixedTransactionAmount(gw.api.financials.CurrencyAmount); in multicurrency mode, that method should be preferred
      void setFixedTransactionAmount(CurrencyAmount value)
      Sets the value of the FixedTransactionAmount field.
      void setPercentage(java.math.BigDecimal value)
      Sets the value of the Percentage field.

    • Method Detail

      • getMultiCurrencyDisplayName

        java.lang.String getMultiCurrencyDisplayName(Check check)
        Returns DisplayName if Percentage or Check is null. Otherwise returns FixedTransactionAmount formatted with Check.Currency.

      • getFixedAmount

        java.math.BigDecimal getFixedAmount()
        defers to #getFixedTransactionAmount; in multicurrency mode, that method should be preferred

      • setFixedAmount

        void setFixedAmount(java.math.BigDecimal value)
        defers to setFixedTransactionAmount(gw.api.financials.CurrencyAmount); in multicurrency mode, that method should be preferred

      • getClaimCurrency

        Currency getClaimCurrency()
        Gets this check portion's claim's currency. Required by the "claimcurrency" datatype to resolve the claim currency.

      • getCheckCurrency

        Currency getCheckCurrency()
        Gets this check portion's check's currency. Required by the "checkcurrency" datatype to resolve the check currency.

      • getReservingCurrency

        Currency getReservingCurrency()
        Gets this check portion's check's reserving currency. Required by the "reservingcurrency" datatype to resolve the reserving currency.

      • setPercentage

        void setPercentage(java.math.BigDecimal value)
        Sets the value of the Percentage field.

      • setFixedTransactionAmount

        void setFixedTransactionAmount(CurrencyAmount value)
        Sets the value of the FixedTransactionAmount field.
